last_episode_to_air.name: Drunk History Christmas - Feat. Ryan Gosling, Jim Carrey & Eva Mendes
last_episode_to_air.overview: A very special Drunk History Christmas.

name: Drunk History
overview: The original web series featuring historical reenactments by A-list comedy/acting talent, presented by Derek Waters and many inebriated history buff storytellers.

episodes.name: Drunk History Vol. 1 - Feat. Michael Cera
episodes.overview: On August 6th 2007, Mark Gagliardi drank a bottle of scotch and then discussed a famous historical event. That night history was made. Drunk History.

episodes.name: Drunk History Vol. 2 - Feat. Jack Black
episodes.overview: Eric Falconer, a Benjamin Franklin expert, reveals his controversial theory about the discovery of electricity. Witness history told as it's never been told before...Drunk.

episodes.name: Drunk History Vol. 2.5 - Feat. Jack Black
episodes.overview: Later that November night Eric Falconer, the Franklin expert, drank more vodka and then discussed this historical event...

episodes.name: Drunk History Vol. 3 - Feat. Danny McBride
episodes.overview: Late one night Jen Kirkman drank a bottle and a half of wine and then discussed the gripping tale of Oney Judge, George and Martha Washington's favourite slave.

episodes.name: Drunk History Vol. 4 - Feat. Paul Schneider
episodes.overview: See the drunken tale of William Henry Harrison, the ninth U.S President, who was sixty eight years old when he was elected.

episodes.name: Drunk History Vol. 5  - Feat. Will Ferrell, Don Cheadle & Zooey Deschanel
episodes.overview: Jen Kirkman has two bottles of wine and tells us the story of how the friendship of Abraham Lincoln and Frederick Douglass overcame the slavery movement and the racism that existed in their day.

episodes.name: Drunk History Vol. 6 - Feat. John C. Reilly & Crispin Glover
episodes.overview: Late one night Duncan Trussell had a six pack of beer and a bottle of absinthe and sat down to tell us about the amazing story of Nikola Tesla, the father of western technology, who sailed to America to meet Thomas Edison and work for him.

episodes.name: Drunk History Christmas - Feat. Ryan Gosling, Jim Carrey & Eva Mendes
episodes.overview: A very special Drunk History Christmas.
